metadata.title: CVE-2011-0765 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: Unspecified vulnerability in lft in pWhois Layer Four Traceroute (LFT) 3.xbefore 3.3 allows local users to gain privileges via a crafted commandline.

criterions.comment: lft: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
